dc:title: Day After Day - November 1936
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reflections on our being children of one Father, thanksgiving, the worth of spreading the "Christian revolution" by distributing the Catholic Worker paper, distributing clothes, and other stories of life on Mott Street.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 307 1936-11-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
